ComicInfo.Summary:
Final part of the first 2000AD Strontium Dog story this prog.
Cover: Mike McMahon (Judge Dredd)
Judge Dredd - The Day the Law Died (part 6) (John Wagner - Brian Bolland and Garry Leach - Tom Frame)Ro-Busters - Ro-Jaw's Memoirs (part 2) (Pat Mills - Mike Dorey - Steve Potter)Flesh - book two (part 9) (Geoffrey Miller - Massimo Belardinelli - Peter Knight)Tharg's Future Shocks - Cold Kill (Mike Cruden - Garry Leach - Peter Knight)Strontium Dog - The Galaxy Killers (part 9 - final part) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)
